text:
@ImranKhanPTI A country which is currently BEGGING the IMF for its 22nd bailout since the 1960s...

Whose economy is currently contracting...

Will teach us...a 3Trillion$ economy with 493Billion$ in Forex & a current COVID19 stimulus package of 277Billion$ as to how to handle our people!

🙂
